job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: strongCareers that Change Lives brbrstrongMedtronic Cardiac Rhythm ManagementCRM RampD teams develop the medical technologies that save lives and improve quality of living for millions of patients across the world As part of the CRM Operation team the Monitoring and Observability team leverages various software technologies to create enhance and observe into all of the applications and in all environments The team is looking for a proactive selfstarting strong software development engineerbrbrThis position is a Software Engineer I role within CRHF organization focused on MonitoringObservability development It is responsible for the development maintenance and support of the CareLink application It works in a team setting to meetexceed business and quality objectives This individual will operate in all phases and contribute to all activities of the software development process from design to verificationbrbrThis individual will work in a software development ecosystem that includes but is not limited to Microsoft Azure C ASPNET MVC Git Azure DevOps Octopus Deploy Azure DevOps Pipelines API Microservices Microsoft SQL ServerbrbrstrongDay in the
